title: Forocoches Fan Token
author: Forocoches Fan Token
content: Forocoches Fan Token You have listened well, after so many months preparing the project, programming the token and studying the different ways to carry it out, today is the day in which my team and I are going to present our work.Finally arrives the token that is going to revolutionize the market. Features:- FCFT will be available on the BSC network.-288,288,288 tokens. -We will allocate a percentage of our tokens to hooliganism to viralize our project.-For us, shures for years, we will count on the community to make decisions about the future of the token (weekly votes on donations, public trolling, etc...).How does FCFT work?FCFT is the abbreviation of Forocoches Fan Token; each transaction made with this token, either buying or selling, automatically generates a 10% commission that is divided into several parts:- Liquidity= 3%- Marketing, Charity= 3%.- Rewards holders in B.USD = 2%.- Buy Back and burning of tokens = 2%.Liquidity Blocked We know that in this kind of projects there is a risk of rug-pulls, that's why we will block the liquidity to be totally transparent, so nobody will be able to manipulate those funds avoiding disasters.VisionOur goal is to have a cryptocurrency that lasts over time, that is influential and above all that represents a brilliant community. PRE-SALEFor this kind of large-scale projects, pre-sales are almost mandatory. As we do not have funds for the initial liquidity, we are forced to carry out this act so that the token succeeds and is not a failure. We will allocate the pre-sale to bring this liquidity to the token at launch.OBJECTIVES:❌ Get website out.❌ 500 people telegram.❌ Publish contract.❌ 100 Holders❌ TOP 10 daily on Coinsniper.❌ TOP 10 daily on Watcher.guru.❌ List on Coingecko.❌ List on CoinMarketCap (we need 1,000 holders).❌ List on small exchange (Gate.io, Hotbit...)❌ List on big exchange (KuCoin...)Are you ready?Telegram: https://t.me/forocochesfantokenTwitter: https://twitter.com/ForocochesToken?t=wOutmJsrWrw69qO7cIWcmA&s=08
